DOC.brief_summary: To evaluate antiviral activity safety two formulation saquinavir combination license nucleoside antiretroviral drug .
DOC.brief_title: A Randomized , Parallel Arm , Comparative , Open Label , Multicenter Study Activity Safety Two Formulations Saquinavir Combination With Other Antiretroviral Drugs
DOC.detailed_description: Patients randomize receive either hard gel soft gel capsule saquinavir combination least one licensed nucleoside antiretroviral . Treatment continue 48 week . After first 16 week , patient give opportunity roll saquinavir formulation choice .
DOC.criteria: Inclusion Criteria Patients must : HIV infection . Antiretroviral naiveness ( i.e. , less 4 week prior treatment ) least one license nucleoside drug . No 2 week prior treatment protease inhibitor . No active opportunistic infection serious AIDSdefining condition . Exclusion Criteria Coexisting Condition : Patients follow symptoms condition exclude : Malabsorption inadequate oral intake . Lab clinical abnormality bad grade 3 ( exerciseinduced CPK elevation ) . Unexplained , chronic diarrhea , define three loose stool per day persist 2 week within month prior study entry . Active malignancy anticipate need chemotherapy study . Anticipated need disallow medication study . Concurrent Medication : Excluded : Other protease inhibitor . Prior Medication : Excluded : More 4 week prior nucleoside antiretroviral select patient 's regimen . More 2 week protease inhibitor .
